EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell’s Ovation Select Is Designed for Challenger 604
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[http://www.constantaviation.com/]]>
Constant Aviation is proud to offer Honeywell's state-of-the-art, cabin management system (CMS), Ovation Select ® for Challenger 604.
Ovation Select is designed specifically for Challenger 604 to replace obsolete, Baker C-series CMS systems and offer operators the latest technology in cabin management and in-flight entertainment.
With Ovation Select, Challenger 604 passengers can control a variety of cabin environmental conditions ─ including lighting, seats, temperature, galley and window shades with a simple touch-screen display next to their arm rest or from the convenience of their mobile device.
Avoid obsolescence and start experiencing the latest in CMS technology. Contact Constant Aviation today to learn more about Honeywell’s Ovation Select for Challenger 604.
